title: Limbang (federal constituency)
text:
Limbang is a federal constituency in <a href="Limbang%20Division">Limbang Division</a> (<a href="Limbang%20District">Limbang District</a>), <a href="Sarawak">Sarawak</a>, <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>, that has been represented in the <a href="Dewan%20Rakyat">Dewan Rakyat</a> since 2008.
The federal constituency was created in the 2005 redistribution and is mandated to return a single member to the Dewan Rakyat under the first past the post voting system.
History.
Polling districts.
According to the gazette issued on 30 December 2015, the Limbang constituency has a total of 15 polling districts.
